checklist.title: PHI Encryption
checklist.description: Protected Health Information must be encrypted at rest and in transit.
checklist.action: Enable AES-256 for DB and enforce TLS 1.2+.

checklist.title: Right to be Forgotten
checklist.description: Users must be able to request deletion of all their data.
checklist.action: Implement a 'Delete Account' feature that wipes database records.

checklist.title: Consent Management
checklist.description: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (US)
checklist.action: Add a cookie banner with 'Reject All' option.

checklist.title: Access Logging
checklist.action: Implement comprehensive audit logs for all data access.

checklist.title: Change Management
checklist.action: Enforce Pull Request reviews and CI/CD pipelines.

checklist.title: Access Control Policy
checklist.description: Limit access to information and information processing facilities.

checklist.title: Data Portability
checklist.description: Users must be able to download their data.

checklist.title: Incident Response Plan
checklist.action: Create and test an Incident Response Plan.

checklist.title: Asset Inventory
checklist.description: Maintain an inventory of all information assets.
checklist.action: Create a dynamic list of all servers, DBs, and repositories.
